statements: SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE reservation_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, table_number FROM reservations WHERE is_available = true;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE reservation_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT reservation_id, customer_name FROM reservations WHERE table_number = 5;
SELECT * FROM reservations ORDER BY reservation_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE table_number = 5;
SELECT customer_name, reservation_time FROM reservations WHERE is_available = TRUE ORDER BY reservation_time DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT table_number FROM reservations;
SELECT reservation_id, customer_name FROM reservations WHERE reservation_time > '2022-01-01 10:00:00';
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY reservation_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT reservation_id, user_id, table_number FROM reservations WHERE status = 'confirmed';
SELECT * FROM table_availability WHERE is_available = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM reservations ORDER BY reservation_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as total_reservations FROM reservations GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE user_id = 12345 ORDER BY reservation_time DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT table_number, reservation_time FROM reservations WHERE status = 'confirmed' AND table_number IN (SELECT table_number FROM table_availability WHERE is_available = true) ORDER BY reservation_time ASC;
SELECT count(*) as total_reservations, table_number FROM reservations GROUP BY table_number HAVING total_reservations > 5 ORDER BY total_reservations DESC;
SELECT reservation_id, table_number, reservation_time FROM reservations WHERE reservation_time >= '2022-01-01' AND reservation_time <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY reservation_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, count(reservation_id) as total_reservations FROM reservations GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_reservations DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM reservations;
SELECT customer_name, reservation_time, is_confirmed FROM reservations ORDER BY reservation_time DESC;
SELECT table_id, capacity, is_available FROM tables WHERE is_available = TRUE;
SELECT reservation_id, customer_name, reservation_time FROM reservations WHERE is_confirmed = FALSE;
SELECT reservation_time, table_id, reservation_id FROM reservations_history ORDER BY reservation_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE table_id = 3 AND is_confirmed = true;
SELECT reservation_id, customer_name, reservation_time FROM reservations ORDER BY reservation_time DESC;
SELECT table_id, table_name, capacity FROM tables WHERE is_available = true ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT reservation_id, table_id, reservation_time FROM reservations_history WHERE is_cancelled = true AND table_id = 4;
SELECT customer_name, reservation_time FROM reservations WHERE reservation_time > '2022-01-01T00:00:00' ORDER BY reservation_time;
SELECT * FROM reservations;
SELECT reservation_id, guest_name, reservation_date FROM reservations WHERE is_confirmed = TRUE;
SELECT table_name, is_available FROM tables WHERE is_available = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM reservations_history ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT guest_name, reservation_date, is_confirmed FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date >= '2022-01-01' AND is_confirmed = TRUE ORDER BY reservation_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT reservation_id, guest_name, table_name FROM reservations INNER JOIN tables ON reservations.table_id = tables.table_id WHERE tables.is_available = TRUE ORDER BY reservations.reservation_id;

SELECT guest_name, reservation_date, table_name FROM reservations INNER JOIN tables ON reservations.table_id = tables.table_id WHERE reservation_date < '2022-01-15' AND is_confirmed = TRUE ORDER BY reservation_date ASC, guest_name;

SELECT r.guest_name, t.table_name, rh.action_type FROM reservations r JOIN tables t ON r.table_id = t.table_id JOIN reservations_history rh ON r.reservation_id = rh.reservation_id WHERE rh.action_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY rh.action_timestamp DESC;

SELECT r.reservation_id, r.guest_name, t.table_name, tu.new_availability FROM reservations r JOIN tables t ON r.table_id = t.table_id JOIN table_updates tu ON t.table_id = tu.table_id WHERE tu.update_timestamp < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY tu.update_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM reservation;
SELECT guest_name, reservation_date FROM reservation WHERE table_number = 5;
SELECT id, guest_name, reservation_date FROM reservation WHERE reservation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT guest_name FROM reservation WHERE is_available = true;
SELECT guest_name, email, phone_number FROM guest_info;
SELECT * FROM reservation WHERE reservation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY guest_name DESC;
SELECT guest_name, reservation_date, table_number FROM reservation WHERE is_available = TRUE ORDER BY reservation_date ASC;

SELECT reservation.id, guest_name, reservation_date, is_available FROM reservation JOIN reservation_history ON reservation.id = reservation_history.reservation_id WHERE reservation_history.status = 'confirmed' ORDER BY reservation_date DESC;
SELECT guest_name, email, phone_number FROM guest_info WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT table_number, available_time_start, available_time_end FROM table_availability WHERE available_time_start < '12:00:00';
